statements: SELECT * FROM TeamTasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id, deadline FROM TeamTasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT description FROM TeamTasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, status FROM TeamTasks WHERE deadline >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM TeamTasks WHERE assignee_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeamTasks WHERE deadline < NOW() ORDER BY task_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT task_name, description FROM TeamTasks WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT * FROM TeamTasks WHERE assignee_id = 123 AND status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT task_id, task_name, assignee_id FROM TeamTasks WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31' AND status = 'Pending'
SELECT task_id, task_name, description, deadline FROM TeamTasks WHERE status = 'Pending' AND task_name LIKE '%SQL%'
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to='John-Doe';
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tasks JOIN projects ON tasks.assigned_to = projects.project_manager;
SELECT task_name, deadline, project_name FROM tasks LEFT JOIN projects ON tasks.task_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM team_tasks;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM team_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM team_tasks WHERE assigned_to='Alice';
SELECT * FROM task_status ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text, commenter_name, comment_time FROM task_comments WHERE task_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM team_tasks ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, status, update_time FROM team_tasks JOIN task_status ON team_tasks.task_id = task_status.task_id WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_id, task_name, comment_text, commenter_name, comment_time FROM team_tasks LEFT JOIN task_comments ON team_tasks.task_id = task_comments.task_id;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, task_id FROM project_tasks;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, task_name FROM projects JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id JOIN tasks ON project_tasks.task_id = tasks.task_id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS num_tasks FROM projects JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING num_tasks > 1;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY project_end_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_assigned_to, task_deadline FROM Tasks WHERE task_project_id = 1;
SELECT status_name, progress_date, progress_notes FROM TaskProgress WHERE status_id = 2 ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description, member_name FROM Tasks INNER JOIN TeamMembers ON Tasks.task_assigned_to = TeamMembers.member_id;
SELECT project_name, count(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM Projects LEFT JOIN Tasks ON Projects.project_id = Tasks.task_project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT task_name, progress_date, status_name FROM Tasks INNER JOIN TaskProgress ON Tasks.task_id = TaskProgress.task_id INNER JOIN TaskStatus ON TaskProgress.status_id = TaskStatus.status_id;
